section.title: The Find Global GL Account help screen
section.para: The default screen is for the Global GL Settings tab is 'List Accounts'. If the demo data has been loaded then the default screen displays a list of the general ledger accounts that form the Global Chart of Accounts template. All general ledger accounts must exist in the global template before it can be assinged to be used at the organisation level (eg Company)
It is used to view or edit the details of the general ledger accounts in the global template and there are options to print or export the account details.
